activities: The data transferred to Kelly Services and/or its US based operations from the Kelly operations in the EU or Switzerland may be used for a variety of purposes including: a.) providing employment and career development services to individuals b.) providing employee benefits and services for full time and temporary employees c.) providing staffing services and solutions to customers and partners d.) processing for compliance with a legal obligation e.) processing for purposes consented to by the subjects of the data These data are collected and may be transferred to or stored in the U.S. in support of the company's staffing and employment services, regulatory, marketing, sales, financial, legal and other business activities. Kelly does not sell personal information. Individuals with questions or concerns should contact us at our U.S. World Headquarters in Michigan via our email address at "privacy@kellyservices.com"
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) as we process human resources data.
